word: G3872 - παρακαταθήκη - parakatathḗkē - par-ak-at-ath-ay'-kay - That which is committed to

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: That which is committed to
Part(s) of speech: Noun Feminine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (பெண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From a compound of G3844 and G2698; something put down alongside, that is, a deposit (sacred trust): - that (thing) which is committed (un-) to (trust).
